data.title: Connections & Belonging
data.meta_description: At UNCW, you belong. We want to help you to feel welcome, connected and engaged during your time here. As a public university, UNCW supports mutual respect, acceptance and open-mindedness among students, faculty, staff and the broader community.
data.text:
At UNCW, you belong. We want to help you to feel welcome, connected and engaged during your time here. As a public university, UNCW supports mutual respect, acceptance and open-mindedness among students, faculty, staff and the broader community.

We are stronger as an institution because our students, faculty and staff bring vastly different perspectives and life experiences to our university. UNCW's Seahawk Respect Compact outlines our values and our commitment to each other as individuals.

Explore our programs, activities and organizations that will help you become involved and make you feel that UNCW is your home.
